message.body: Merav, I posted on yelp! Do I need an account to post on Angie's List?
Oh my!! Thanks so much!! If you feel like it!! I don't think it takes long. Most of the yelp reviews aren't going up unfortunately...
Thank you!!! For everything! Â I think I have to pay for the Angie's list .... Do you know a way I can bypass that?
I could just have also gotten confused and missed something..,
No. You don't have to pay to post a review. Just to read reviews of other companies.
